name: SpiritBox
description:
SpiritBox

Somewhere, somehow a box was opened and ghosty spirits escaped.
You are a ghosthunter and you have to collect all the spirits and put them back into the box.
Once you collected all of them and found the box to put them back in, you will be surprised what will come out of the box.

Controls:
Use the ARROW Keys to move arround

Team:
Kyunru...Handdrawn Art, Game Design, Game Programming and everything else :)

Credits:
Backgroundmusic
Background image Watercolor Paper
